Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I'm looking for a game, I do not know what kind, or anything about it. Something unique and fun and addictive, with elements of KSP in it such as space travel and other planets, but it needs to be first person and maybe a survival type game?

I have been searching through websites Indiedb and steam for hours and can't find anything!

Suggestions anyone?

7499275

ever played gmod? It's a sandbox game, and you can make literally EVERYTHING in that game. From helicopters, planes, rockets, engines, hoverboards to teleporters. Although it takes a good amount of time to master, there is also a coding side in it. You can make very complicated, automatic stuff in it.

You should try it.
Maybe StarMade, its a voxel based space exploration game.
Its not quite what you want, but you should check out Red Eclipse, its a FPS game.
Intersteller marines is a no, Starmade I play and for the rest I'll check out later!
Check out war thunder, it is a cool combat plane game. (And free)

Guns of Icarus Online.

Nuff' Said
